verses.roman:
gauḍa-deśa-bhaktera kaila saṅkṣepa kathana
ananta caitanya-bhakta nā yāya gaṇana

synonyms: gauḍa-deśa—in Bengal; bhaktera—of the devotees; kaila—I have described; saṅkṣepa—in brief; kathana—narration; ananta—unlimited; caitanya-bhakta—devotees of Lord Caitanya; nā—not; yāya—can be; gaṇana—counted.
translation: I have given a brief description of the devotees of Lord Caitanya in Bengal. Actually His devotees are innumerable.
